SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
General base of an action executed by the RMI Server
Card
Abstract class to manage all types of cards
CardColor
Enumeration for the different card colors
CardResource
Interface implemented by Resource, Item and CornerValue to get the list of possible value of a corner
CardResourcesDeserializer
Class used by Gson to deserialize the `CardResource` interface
ChatMessage
Class that represents how the instance of a message in the chat is
ChooseColorAction
Action to choose the color
ChooseColorController
Controller
ChooseObjectiveController
Controller to choose Objective card
ChooseOtherFieldsController
Controller to choose the player's field to view
ChooseSecretObjectiveAction
Action to choose the secret objective
ChooseStarterController
Controller to choose the starter card
ClientChat
Represents a client-side chat interface that manages chat messages.
ClientDeck
Class to manage the generation of cards client side
ClientField
Class to manage the field client side
ClientFieldGUI
Backend of gui that manages all about the players' fields
ClientHandler
Classes which handles Client requests for Socket connection
ClientModel
Represents the client-side model of the game application.
ConditionType
List of special ScoreCondition
Corner
Class to manage the corner of a card
CornerPosition
Enumeration for the four different angles of the card
CornerValue
List of special corner values
CreateGameAction
Action to create a new game
CurrentFieldController
Controller that manages the view when is not your turn
Deck
Abstract class to manage all types of decks
DefaultValue
Class to store common default values
DrawCardAction
Action to draw a card
DrawCardController
Controller which allows the player to chose which card to draw
Field
Class to manage the playing field of a player
FlipCardAction
Action to flip a card
GameInProgressException
Exception thrown when trying to add a player to a game in progress
GameState
Enumeration to indicate the state of the game
GenericController
Generic controller class
GoldenCard
This class is used to represent cards that give points It is similar to ResourceCard but with some requirements and benefits
GoldenDeck
Class to manage a deck of golden cards
GUI
GUI class implements the UI interface for graphical user interface interactions in CodexNaturalis game.
IntroController
Controller of the first scene to view when starting the application
Item
List of game items
ItemStrategy
Class for the item strategy (Give two points for each pair of item)
JoinByIdController
Controller that manages joining a room knowing the Id
JoinFirstGameAction
Action to join the first available game
JoinGameAction
Action to join a selected game
LeaveAction
Action to leave the room
LStrategy
Class for the LStrategy (Give three points for each successful pattern)
MainAction
Base for actions executed on the main controller
MainClient
Executable class for the client
MainController
Class that manages all the rooms for multiple games functionality
MainServer
Executable class for the server
MaxPlayersInException
Exception thrown when trying to add a player to a full game
MenuController
Controller of the Menu where you can choose if to create a newGame or joining an existing one
NetworkClient
Common interface between Socket and RMI clients
NewChatMessageAction
Actions to add a new message to the chat
ObjectiveCard
This class is used to represent objective cards (it uses a strategy pattern)
ObjectiveDeck
Class to manage a deck of objective cards
ObserverManager
Class that manages the notifications to the clients
PlayableCard
Abstract class to merge StarterCard, ResourceCard as they are both playable by the player
PlayCardAction
Action to play a card
PlayController
Controls the action of playing a card on the player's field
Player
Class to manage the player
PlayerAlreadyInException
Exception thrown when trying to add a player with the same name to a game
PlayerColor
Enumeration for different player colors
PlayerResource
Interface implemented by Item and Resource to get a list of possible player resources
Position
Class to manage a field position
Resource
List of game resources
ResourceCard
Class to represent Resource Card
ResourceDeck
Class to manage a deck of resource cards
ResourceStrategy
Class for the resource strategy (Give two points every three resources)
RmiClient
Implementation of an RMI Client
RmiServer
Implementation of an RMI Server
Room
Class to manage the room
RoomAction
Base for actions executed on the room controller
RoomController
Class that manages a room
SceneEnum
Enumeration of the scenes
ScoreCondition
Interface implemented by Item and ConditionType to get the list of possible score conditions of the golden cards
ScoreConditionDeserializer
Class used by Gson to deserialize the `ScoreCondition` interface
SetUpController
Allows the player to choose his nickname, the server IP and the type of connection he wants to use
ShowObjectivesController
Controller that allowes the player to view the common objectives to achieve to make extra points
SocketClient
Socket Client
SocketClientMessage
Socket Client Messages to the server
SocketServer
Server that uses Socket connection type
SocketServerMessage
Socket Messages from server to Client
StairStrategy
Class for the StairStrategy (Give three points for each successful pattern)
StarterCard
Class to represent the starter card, root of the player field
StarterDeck
Class to manage a deck of starter cards
Strategy
Interface for the different types of strategies for the objective cards
StrategyAdapter
Class used by Gson to be able to use the `Strategy` interface
SwitchReadyAction
Action to switch ready
TablePointController
Controller to view the table points, in order to see which how many points has every player
TablePosition
Enumeration for the possible table position to draw from
ThreeStrategy
Class for the ThreeStrategy (Give three points every three different items)
TUI
Class to manage the TUI of the game
UI
Interface to combine different types of user interfaces
VirtualServer
Remote interface for the RMI Server
VirtualView
Interface for the client
WaitingOthersController
Controller that shows a scene while waiting for other players
WaitingRoom
Class to manage the waiting room
WaitingRoomController
Controller of the waiting room, where player can set themselves ready or not
WinnerController
Controller that shows the final scene when one or more players win
